name: Goldman's Saloon
description:
NOTE: local multiplayer is not tested!!

GAMEPAD:

DPad to navigate menus, A for accept

Left Stick to move

Right stick to aim

A to kick tables

Left trigger for bullet time

Right trigger for shoot

KEYBOARD:

Arrow keys to navigate menu, enter for accept

WASD to move

Arrow keys to aim

Space to shoot

Left shift bullet time

Right shift kick tables

Like the soundtrack? You can buy it here: https://cartermenary.bandcamp.com/album/goldmans-saloon-original-soundtrack
